name: Pong Clone #24,974
description:
The Pong clone you never knew you wanted… now you got it, and you still don't want it. But it's here, so just play it!

GOAL and INSTRUCTIONS

Objective is scoring goals by sending the ball of your colour past the enemy's ship. Demolish buildings to get new balls to throw [using X or M] at your opponent. The more a ball bounces, the more points it gives you when you score!

First to get to 24,974 points wins.

CONTROLS

  • Player 1: [WS] or [AD] to move - [X] to launch ball
  • Player 2: [IK] or [JL] to move - [M] to launch ball
  • [R] to Restart the game.
